entry.title: $1800 // Spacious 2 1/2 Bedroom One Half Block to Subway Avail. Now
entry.content:
Location, Location, Location
This unit is located on a well maintained residential block.
Apartment is a 4 1/2 Rm. 2 1/2 Bedroom unit on the second floor of a 3 Family private home.
Unit has 2 entrances, lots of sunlight, Great for a family or a couple. High ceilings and lots of windows.
Centrally located near Schools, Supermarkets, Houses of Worship and half block to the 45th street Subway Station (R and N Line) and 2 blocks to 5th avenue B 63 Bus Service.

Unit is currently under renovation. Pictures will be updated upon completion.

Unit will be available for occupancy on February 1st.

Wont last, we have keys and can show at any time.
Broker: One Month Brokers Fee plus $ 50.00 for Application, Credit and Background Search Fee per Applicant on Lease
Landlord: One Months Rent and One Months Security
Call for more information.


Jesus Maldonado 347-261-0127


Maldonado Properties
Licensed Real Estate Broker
1907 Flushing Avenue
Ridgewood, NY 11385
Office: 347-261-0127
"We Open Doors"
